tag_list: javascript, html5, serial-entrepreneur, cloud-computing, ruby, python, web-applications, development, web-2-0, open-source, php
overview: Ruben Daniels, Ajax co-founder and CEO, started his first company at an age of 14 and has since owned and sold multiple businesses. He specializes in strategic partnerships and business development, and his vision of bringing software development to the cloud is leading the Ajax startup to profitability. With 11 years of professional experience in web development, Ruben combined trends in cloud, apps, social media, and mobile into the Cloud9 IDE, to forever change the way web applications are built.
